attributes.action: Put a hold on bills for water, gas, rent, mortgages etc. Whilst quarantined
attributes.additional_details: Following the example of European leaders who are helping the population of their country to worry less. To be not forced to work even when ill and risk the transmission of coronavirus to the general population especially those at risk.
attributes.background: Suspend bill payments/rent/mortgage payments for households to give relief for those affected by the coronavirus outbreak and unable to go to work.
